caption: This music is a lively instrumental of the Indian Classical instruments. The tempo is fast with a lead Veena harmony, spirited tabla and tanpura rhythm and melodic flute accompaniment. The music is euphoric, mellifluous, dulcet, lively, high spirited and rich. This music is a Indian Classical Veena instrumental.
